title: T-Mobile announces a network-level, AI-based Live Translation feature that supports 50+ languages, coming "this spring" in beta and available on 4G LTE and 5G (Jess Weatherbed/The Verge)
tags: The Verge;T-Mobile announces a network-level, AI-based Live Translation feature that supports 50+ languages, coming“this spring” in beta and available on 4G LTE and 5G
